name: GunQuest
description:
GunQuest is an action RPG where you use firearms to combat fantasy creatures. Find and craft guns, trade with natives, upgrade your armory, and conquer the infinite plain in GunQuest!

Interact with the Developer

Also, Psst... GunQuest has a discord server! Follow the development process and give input on the direction of the game!


Gameplay Features

  • Overworld Caravan Travel
  • Fast paced combat
  • Enemy Variety
  • Interesting NPCs
  • Dynamic Dialogue Options

Find New Weapons!

Fight Enemies!

Interact with NPCs!
